RelatedSentence: In the first quarter of 2014 , South Korean tourists represented nearly 25 percent of all inbound tourist arrivals according to the Department of Tourism .
Tigerair Philippines was acquired by Cebu Pacific earlier this year in a deal worth US $ 15 million .

The deal increased Cebu Pacific 's domestic market share up to 56 percent and provided the airline with access to Tigerair 's valuable slot portfolio at the highly congested Ninoy Aquino International Airport .
Tigerair Philippines and Cebu Pacific are expected to carry nearly 17 million passengers in 2014 .
